meanings.sent1: I used twoonies to buy a snack at the vending machine.
meanings.sent2: I have a collection of twoonies from different years.
meanings.sent3: The twoonies in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: The twoonies sparkled in the sunlight like little treasures.
meanings.sent5: I always keep my twoonies in a special jar to save them.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'twoonie', referring to multiple Canadian two-dollar coins.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my bills for twoonies at the bank.
meanings.sent2: She counted her twoonies carefully before paying.
meanings.sent3: The twoonies rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The sound of twoonies clinking together is so satisfying.
meanings.sent5: I felt rich holding a handful of twoonies in my hand.
